title: Latest updates: Derbyshire Live on Thursday 23 March 2017 - BBC News
summary: burst water pipe fixed , say severn trent .
road reopens after fire behind takeaway .
london attack : council flies flag at half mast .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for derbyshire and east staffordshire have finished for the day , but we 'll be back at 08:00 tomorrow with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather .

documents.title: east midlands weather update : clearer spells tonight
text: there 'll be clearer spells tonight with cloud increasing from the south in the early hours .
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: rbs and natwest banks across region set to close
text: hundreds of jobs will be lost following a. decision to close almost 160 rbs and natwest branches .
across the country .
rbs has blamed a `` dramatic shift '' in banking , with branch transactions falling 43 % since 2010 .
in the same period , online and mobile transactions have increased by more than 400 % .
these derbyshire branches are set to close :
an rbs spokesman said : `` the role of the branch is fast moving to a centre for advice , away from basic transactions .
while the branch will still be a core part of our offering to customers , inevitably some branches will have to close . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police appeal to trace man after dog attack in alvaston
text: police have launched an appeal to trace a dog walker after a dog and his owner were attacked in fields behind noel baker school in alvaston .

a man and his wife were walking their cavalier king charles spaniel dog ( below ) on tuesday at about 11:50 when it is alleged the dog was attacked by one of two `` pit bull '' type dogs that were on leads being walked by a man .
derbyshire police said while attempts were made to separate the two dogs , it is then alleged the man was bitten on the arm by the same `` pit bull '' type dog .
the cavalier king charles spaniel dog was forced to visit the vets and has been taking medication , while the owner has received treatment for bite marks on his arm .
the dog walker police wish to speak to is described as being white , 50 to 55 years of age , about 6ft 2ins tall with a large build .
he was said to be wearing `` walking '' type clothes and wellington boots .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: london attack : woman thanks police with chocolates
text: another example of the kind gestures shown to our police forces up and down the country today
a lady has given us some chocs as thanks for the work we do as she reflects on the # westminsterattack , + her son is a cop .
# westandtogether
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derby pupils on london trip diverted away from parliament
text: pupils at gayton junior school in derby were due to be at westminster at the time of yesterday 's attack .
five members of staff and 20 children had just visited the imperial war museum - and were due to go to the houses of parliament , but were diverted away as news of what had happened spread .
the headteacher jo chapman says the children were kept safe and parents were informed .
author: Andrew Strachan
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: your photos : clear skies over chesterfield
text: it 's a beautiful day in chesterfield this afternoon .
this photo of the heage windmill was taken by viki the blue .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: london attack : fire and police hq fly flag at half mast
text: both flags at the joint headquarters for derbyshire fire and rescue service and derbyshire police are flying at half mast to honour the victims of yesterday 's attacks .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ashbourne youngsters lend a helping hand
text: it seems you 're never too young to lend a helping hand - just look at these little 'uns from ashbourne hilltop nursery
a big well done to the pupils of # ashbourne hilltop nursery & infant school for doing their bit in the # greatbritishspringclean .
great work !
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: hospital visits restricted over norovirus symptoms
text: a number of patients at queen 's hospital in burton-upon-trent are reporting symptoms of norovirus .
the trust that runs the hospital is restricting visits to patients on ward five to prevent the infection spreading further .
it 's warned the virus can be potentially fatal for vulnerable people .
author: Rory Gallimore
BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: burst water pipe is fixed , severn trent say
text: severn trent has now confirmed that the water pipe in mansfield road is fixed and they are beginning to get the road back to normal .
however , they have said the road will not reopen until `` at least monday '' .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: emergency bus service launched after burst water main
text: notts & derby buses has said today it will be providing a shuttle bus from chester green to and from derby city centre due to the continued road closure from sunday 's burst water main .
the service will run between 08:00 and 18:00 daily and 10:00 to 16:00 on sundays until further notice .
these shuttle buses will run every 20 minutes from chester green road , via the ring road and will stop at bus stop c7 , derwent street in the city centre .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: trent barton bus services back to normal
text: buses can run as normal now the road in alfreton has reopened
we have been advised that the roads in alfreton are now open and all services can revert to their normal route .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: alfreton fire due to 'electrical fault '
text: # dfrs are currently dealing with a large fire on king street # alfreton avoid the area if possible .
crews now leaving scene & kings street is now reopen.fi has determined the most probable cause was faulty electrical appliance in the kitchen
what crews attended this i know alp from chesterfield was there
author: Dave Wade
BBC Local Live

documents.title: kymberley holden inquest : prescription error 'significantly contributed ' to death
text: a coroner has recorded a narrative verdict into the death of 27-year-old derbyshire woman .
kymberley holden , a multiple sclerosis sufferer who an inquest heard was prescribed 10 times the correct dosage of a painkiller before her death .
the coroner told the inquest : `` i can not and do not find that prescription error by dr axten caused kymberley 's death but i do find it made a significant contribution . ''
miss holden 's father and brother said that they are `` satisfied '' with the coroner 's findings and conclusions , but are considering a civil case .
author: Navtej Johal
East Midlands Today reporter

documents.title: derby photographers find images dating back to 1852
text: newly-restored photographs are going on display to mark a restoration project .
ww winter ( walter william winter ) in derby had been organising its 150th anniversary when staff found images dating back to 1852 .
the firm has been in the same building since 1867 , however it appears to have began 15 years earlier in a shed just metres away .
many of the images have been rescued from dumps found in the building 's cellars .
author: Greig Watson
Reporter, BBC News Online

documents.title: london attack : 'derby stands with london '
text: derby city council was also one of many local authorities and organisations to hold a minute 's silence this morning .
they added on twitter : `` derby stands with london . ''
( 2/2 ) at 9.33 a minutes silence will be held as a national mark of respect .
derby stands with london .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: london attack : derby city council flies flag at half mast
text: derby city council has lowered their flag to fly at half mast to pay their respects to those affected in yesterday 's .
attack in westminster .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: london attack : burton mp returns to parliament
text: in parliament to observe a minute silence to mark yesterday 's tragedy .
then on to the business of the house as usual
thank you for being our mp .
reminded again yesterday of how precious democracy is .
thank you .
we will win and the terrorists will fail .
@ twitterid what ? ?
heckling each other and behaving like children
or betraying half the population by selling out to the alt-right
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: london attack : derby north mp praises security services
text: derby north mp amanda solloway , who was in parliament at the time of yesterday 's attack , .
has praised the response of the security services - but says the simplicity of the attack makes it hard for officials to know how to respond .
`` it 's just one of those incidents that you can not legislate for , and i think of those poor people on the bridge , '' she said .
`` how can you legislate for that ?
it 's awful . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: burst water main works 'pretty much there '
text: remember this ?
now severn trent has said they are `` pretty much there '' with the repairs to the .
water main in chester green , which burst on sunday .
repairs have taken longer than expected due to complications with the curve in the pipe .
the water company said it wo n't be long before work starts on getting the road back to normal .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: alfreton fire : 'dampening down going to take some time '
text: wayne brooks , from derbyshire fire and rescue service , is the station manager at alfreton .
he said the emergency services need to keep the road closed for now .
`` we have got the main areas of flame extinguished , '' he said .
`` we are looking at dampening down and that 's going to take some time into the morning , causing disruption to the traffic in alfreton . ''
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: alfreton fire : trent barton bus diversions in place
text: important to note if you were planning to catch a trent barton bus this morning
due to the fire on king street , # thecomet is diverting and unfortunately having to miss hay hotel , shirland church , and higham school
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: alfreton fire : four fire engines still at scene
text: four fire engines are still at the scene behind the new bengal takeaway on king street .
the road closure is causing long delays to traffic heading towards the m1 .
according to derbyshire fire and rescue service , the occupants of the building were woken by their fire alarm before they evacuated .
author: Heidi Booth
Journalist, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: watch : firefighters tackle fire behind takeaway
text: watch : firefighters tackle fire behind takeaway
author: Heidi Booth
Journalist, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: travel : fire behind takeaway closes a61 in alfreton
text: one road is closed in alfreton because of a fire behind a takeaway on king street .
author: Heidi Booth
Journalist, BBC Radio Derby

text: here 's how it 's looking today

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live updates
text: good morning , derbyshire and east staffordshire .
welcome along to thursday .
i 'll be with you today with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
if you would like to share your and/or stories , then please get in touch via .
facebook , .
twitter .
or .
email .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
